titleStmt.title: A consolatory discourse perswading to a chearfull trust in God in these times of trouble and danger. By Symon Patrick rector of St. Paul Covent Garden.
titleStmt.author: Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J. Hayes for S. Thomson, at the sign of the Bishops Head in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
